Articles.Content:
Hi, I don't know if this is possible, or easy to accomplish, but I would like to know if someone is interested in this.

Actually, with a modded install it's easy to crash the game due to the 32 bit limitation. This usually happens while recovering, switching to ships or by the way while changing scenes.

It will be possible to have a mod that can make this scene change more smoother for the game, reducing the number of crash?
After Unity 5 we will have 64 bit.
